fulfillment_node_locations.description: The returns locations that use this account that are fulfillment nodes

returns_location_id.description: The Jet-assigned unique ID of this returns locations.  This only needs to be provided if you are updating a return location

fulfillment_node_id.description: The Jet-assigned unique ID of the fulfillment node that is being mapped to this returns location

is_primary.description: Is this the primary returns location?
